title: Uhh riot
body:
Just a question. I get 5/5 in qualifiers. And get bronze 4.
My friend got 8/10, gets bronze 2.

I like it in some ways, but people still troll, (ik u cant control that, but pls do read reports that come in).
I LOVE the new champ select so much!

The matter right now is actually how does my bro get bronze 2 last season (3/10 games won), and then this season bronze 5? (5/5 games W/L)?

replies.body: It highly depends on your MMR.
You're very wrong it has nothing to do with your mmr. Soft reset seems to have a negative impact on your mmr regardless if your mmr raises while you win (7-3/8-2/9-1/10-0)

So i placed s5 year before, s5 last season gaining 30 lp per game yet this season i get placed in b5 , its an easy climb but pls riot ur just wasting peoples time with ur random palcements. In what universe does going 5-5 as a silver elo plyer, put you at the lowest of the low in the solo que ladder. Like there is probrably like a dice roll system that randomely picks what rank you get regardless of your skill or "elo"

Becuase a new unranked account is rated roughly Silver 3-4'ish. So the very first time you play ranked its easier to get higher.

After the first time, your rank from the previous season has a great impact on where you place. You almost always end up below whatever rank you were before the reset even if you go 10-0.
